reviewtext: I was using a proxy server for my home DSL - this is much better, simplier and relatively easy to install.My ping went down to 40 from 110 so I can use the rail gun in quake3 on the internet.I have set up a proxy server so this is a breeze for me... has a built in web server... seems to work better with IE as a browser than Netscape.If you have no experience seting up a router or proxy and NAT. This will be only a little painful only because of your misconceptions on how internet protocols work. But if you try for a while it will work.I did not need to talk to the help desk so can't say much about customer service.Enjoy
